content.detailedDescription:
On my way home from my job, traveling west on pines blvd, i saw 4 redish orangish orbs in a horizontal formation slowly moving, they were spread out with a decent distance of atleast a couple hundrad feet, traveled perfectly in a straight line. then vanish into thin air after about 30 min of me seeing them.

others reported seeing the same orbs of light. planes were visible in the sky aswell and were def different.
content.summary: 4 non pulsating orange orbs in horizontal v formation

content.detailedDescription:
On my way home from my job, traveling west on pines blvd, i saw 4 redish orangish orbs in a horizontal formation slowly moving, they were spread out with a decent distance of atleast a couple hundrad feet, traveled perfectly in a straight line. then vanish into thin air after about 30 min of me seeing them.

others reported seeing the same orbs of light. planes were visible in the sky aswell and were def different.
content.summary: 4 non pulsating orange orbs in horizontal v formation

content.detailedDescription: Kids came in room about 8:30 pm tonight feb 25 2012 said glowing orb flying crazy all over went and looked like ya ok whatvever looked out window south saw a glowing ball like a star falling slowly then hover dropped from low clouds to right above my neibors garage phones quit working tv power was surging we all felt dizzy light headed almost numb bodied thing then just took off with a big flash left a f...... streak in thevsky like a shooting star crazy  who ever says ufos don't exist your crazy as hell !!!
content.summary: Weird weird weird

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside with my wife and daughter looking at my daughters vehicle purchase, when we noticed a clicking sound. then another. all of a sudden we were surrounded by them. so i told my wife that i was going inside to get the camera. when i came out i could still hear the clicking or poping sounds and where ever i heard them i would snap a picture.  the two photos submitted are the result of that encounter.

it should be after we went inside half of the light in our home went out. we tested all the breakers for voltage and we had voltage at the breakers but no voltage for lights in our bedrooms or outlets. what's weird is that the outlets are on a different breaker, but they have no voltage either. 

it may be conincidence, but i really find it strange that the lights would go out in that manner without the breakers being tripped. it's starting to become a little creepy around here.
content.summary: One was balloon like in shape. the other was an orange orb shape.

content.detailedDescription:
I was observing the sky with my sister and my father on the roof of my grandmother's house in vargem grande, and we saw a red-orange light in the sky. we thought was common paper balloon , my sister placed the camera on a small wall, took pictures and a strange shape appeared in the screen. the object was slightly bigger than a star and it was slowly ascending. we felt excited about it, we thought we caught a picture of a ufo. i can't remember when it disappeared, and why we stopped to take pictures... earlier on that day i was going to the house by car and i saw for 2 seconds an "different" object in the sky moving foward with a cloud of smoke behind it. trees entered in my sight and for 5 seconds i couldn't saw the object, and the when i could saw the sky again, the object and the smoke was gone. i thougt this 2 facts are related... it's common to see paper ballons in the area. there's a  story about an abduction in a lake near and my grandfather told me stories about a fireball over the near mountains long time ago.
and sorry for my english
content.summary: I was observing the sky and we saw a light and thought was baloon, my sister took pictures and a strange shape appeared in the screen
content.locationName: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro

content.detailedDescription:
I walked out to in to our driveway and noticed in the sky to the west a bright object that looked like something on fire.  we live within the class b airspace of pittsburgh international airport under the outer ring and commercial aircraft are often on the in-bound approach.  my first thought was that it was a plane with an engine on fire.  then i realized this was moving way to slow for any aircraft.  i called into the house for my son to come out and see it.  as he got out of the house the fireball began to dim as it was moving to the nnw.

he then noticed another fireball moving at slow speed on the same path coming from the south.  we ran into the street to get a good view.  while we were watching, we noticed another on the exact same path.  then there were more.  in all we saw 7 of these fireballs all on the same path moving generally from the south to the north-northwest.  

the area we live in is in the north suburbs of pittsburgh and is in a rural area.  we live in a large golf course development with some heavily wooded areas (immediately behind our house, with the exception of two fairways, it is approximately 20 wooded acres. on this night (2/26/12) there was no measureable wind and the sky was clear of clouds.  planets and stars were visible.  it was 7:05 pm (although in the video i say 8:05 as i misread my watch).  

i am a licensed private pilot and have been flying with my son for several years.  the area where we saw the fireballs (mars, pa ��� seriously, no joke there, it is mars, pa 16046) is under the outer ring of pittsburgh���s class b airspace with a 4,000 ft floor.  we often fly over this area and are conscious of that altitude.  these objects appeared to be below the 4,000 asl floor (our elevation here is approx.. 1,100 ft asl).  i would estimate the altitude of the fireballs to be approx.. 3,000 ft asl.

the fireballs made no sound at all and were moving far too slow to be aircraft.  these did not have aviation position lights, nor were there any lights of any type other than the brilliant bright constant fire red glow.  the glow appeared to be front facing, as it would dim as the orbs moved across the field and the orientation changed, such that as they were moving directly away they were entirely invisible.  however, if the angle changed you could see the light as if from the side.  

there was no wind, and temperatures were in the high 30���s or low 40s.  the orbs were moving too fast to be drifting on the wind, but far too slow (and quiet) to be any airplane (an ultralight would move faster, and would be noisier).  all of the orbs were maintaining altitude and trajectory as they flew in a line.  we watched for 5 minutes, as all of them moved across the sky and then vanished.  we thought we saw a line of red lights later moving generally west to east about 5 miles off to the north, but we cannot say for certain that these were the same object.

we noticed two aircraft after the incident, which seemed to be general aviation planes.  one was moving to the west, and the other was moving south to north.  both seemed to be under pittsburgh���s class b airspace, and were behind the orbs in both time and space.

apologies for the shaky video.  although we didn���t get the trail of the orbs, there are some solid shots of the orbs in the video.  i attempted to get structures and objects in the foreground to give reference points, but this may have been at the expense of a better video.  at one point my son says he hears a low buzzing noise, but we later determine this to be a household heat pump or air conditioner.

check the video at 58 seconds.  it appears to have structure and almost as if there is something burning off around it. again at 1:00 and 1:15 and it appears to be the same structure.  you have to stop the frame as i was moving a bit.  also ��� 1:16 (structure); 2:05 (appears to split); 2:26 (different orb, more yellow color); 2:32 (same structure); 2:36 (planet in background); 3:18 (different orb, same structure); 3:20 (structure, same ���crab��� shape); 3:31 (structure); 3:47 (wing shape); 4:52 (it is moving away and dimming, has appearance of crescent shape); 4:47 (strange blur and object appears to split).
content.summary: Bright red fireballs slow straight line 3-4k ft asl south to north

content.detailedDescription: 5:29 a.M driving to work from east to west on hwy 62 from warrick co. to vand. co to evansville. still dark outside saw object coming from no. ind. sky at a rate of speed never seen before heading towards evansville then suddenly stopped went back  toward n.W. slight climbing elevation for a sec. then changed again and went straight up, again at speed i have never seen and disappeared. airplanes come from that direction landing at e'ville airport but do not glow violet/purple, stop in mid air, change direction and move at that rate of speed. stared at it so bad i about crashed running off the highway. time frame lasting 15-20 sec.   please tell me someone else saw this !!!!!
content.summary: Violet/purple object super high rate of speed instant change of direction

content.detailedDescription: 1. i was outside my home with my brother looking at the stars through his telescope. as he was trying to focus his scope in one orions belt i saw a bright flash to the left of orions belt. when i first noticed it i thought maybe it was a flash from a shooting star but somthing told me it was not that. i asked my brother if he had seen it and he said no. i couldnt get a grip on what i just seen and i was explaining it to my brother when it happened again. it looked like a star that was hooked up to an on/off switch, it just pulsated one quick flash. the third time my brother seen it and i realized it was flashing every couple minutes on the minute. so we used his cell phones stop watch to time it and found that every four minutes it flashed and each time it was further from orions belt. we got my other brother and my dad to come and try to figure out what it could be and they seen it as well every four minutes on the dot. we then realized that it wasnt moving, that it was in synchrinization with the earth. my first reaction was disbelief and then excitement. i dont have any idea what this could be but its been doing it for the last hour now and is still doing it every four minutes. if anyone has an explanation please assist.
content.summary: It is a bright slow beacon pulsing light appearance every 4 minutes

content.detailedDescription: I stayed in my house, seeing tv, was look the sky and see, a bright object. i find that was a helicopter, but with red big luminosity. he stoped during 5 minutes and later, fly for north but he gone slowly, in the follow day, the same thing, in the third day nothing, in the fourth day again, in the fifth time, was in carnival sunday in same place. the sixth and last time  was today 02/26/2012 but this time by 30 minutes blinking fast , blue luminosity and more distant. i can't take photo because i not have cameras good for do them.
content.summary: Cockroach red high luminosity

content.detailedDescription:
Firstly i am a retired af meteorologist and have experience in determining aircraft types. 
i was letting my dogs out when i noticed an unusually bright light in the sky. i called for my wife to take a look. we both noticed that the object was pulsating light. there seemed to be varied colors along with the intense white light. the object was remaining stationary. there were no odd sounds.
i grabbed my binoculars for a better look. upon using the binoculars, i could distinctly see various colors of pulsing lights. 
i called for my son to view the object. his description is the same as ours.
this object did not move; i made notice of a reference point. i used my cell phone's google sky to determine if this maybe was a astral-body. there was no correlation between any stars and the location of this object using google sky's application.
it was see in the east-north-east sky. 
before making this report, i decided to wait 24 hours and see if it was still in the sky at the same location. it was no where to be seen.
i found this to be quite unusual and intriguing.
i did not lose sight of the object as it remain in the same location for hours.
content.summary: Viewed an unusually bright light in the sky. grabbed the binoculars to get a better look. object had defined pulsating lights of varied colors. definitely not a plane or helicopter.

content.detailedDescription:
I turned to walk up my street and, for some reason, turned behind me to about 4 o'clock  (almost due east) and looked up.  i didn't feel an urge to do this, it was automatic.  there were no clouds and i immediately spotted an object.  it was gray, long, horizontally cylindrical and my first inclination was that it was a plane.  it appeared to be hundreds of feet in the sky, and it began to rise but in an 's' pattern.  draw an 's' from bottom to top, and that is the motion the object took.  

it performed two 's' patterns, still remaining horizontal, and traveling left and right about 3 lengths.  it then disappeared.  nothing was obstructing my view, nothing was in this area of the sky but the object, and it appeared the sun was illuminating the object the whole time (which was directly behind me).

the object was not a plane, not a helicopter, not a bird (which was my second gut reaction until i realized the motion was too perfect and then the object vanished).  this was my first sighting and i wanted to be excited, but i wasn't.  i think because no one else saw it with me, there was no way to really know if what i saw was real.  i don't need validation, but sometimes having a second opinion on something this subjective is reassuring.
content.summary: Cigar shape with 's' like movement

content.detailedDescription:

content.summary: Cigar shape with 's' like movement

content.detailedDescription:
I was on the front porch of my parents house along with my parents and sister.  a slash appeared to the right in the distant sky that looked like this / and moved from west to east. 15 to 20 seconds later there was another.  the another.  eventually there were 5 of them.  they moved slowly across the sky and were in sight for about 15 minutes.  

they reached a point in the sky when the first one changed shape and began to ascend... so it seemed.  the bottom part of the slash began moving up as it "ascended".  eventually it turned into a u shape.  as is "ascended" the next one continued in the same path and, once beneath the first, began changing shape as well.  it too changed into a u.  they all did this.  they seemed to be flying towards philadelphia. 

i actually got in the car and drove towards route 95 south.  i was able to keep them in sight untilthe bensalem mall.  at that point i turned off and headed back home.

i was at my friend's store in july 2009 and on the phone with my fiance in italy when i saw the same thing.  i had told her about the earlier sighting and couldn't believe i was seeing the same thing years later.  i called 2 of my friends to see what i was seeing.
content.summary: 5 slashes appeared one at a time. traveled across the sky. each changed shape and ascended.

content.detailedDescription: Well, i've been sitting at my kitchen table most of the day, while on the internet, looking out the window regularly as usual. noticed a few airplanes starting some chem trail activity,and was talking to my mom on my cellphone, with the head set on, and about 6:18pm or so, i looked out the window and up and saw a bright light. i keep my binoculars close by, [at arms length] and just instictively grabed them while listening to mom talk. the light seemed to stay on like a far away handheld spotlight, but then stated moving away from my direction, heading about due west. the light would seen to dim, like when an airplane catches the sun setting in the evening and you can see the reflection from a long ways off. then as the light seemed to dim, i tried to get a focus through my 10x 50 power binoc's, but could only make out an object that seemed to be vauge in shape. i could't make out the shape. it must have been really high up in the sky, because it was way above the chemtrails, and i can always make out the engine configuration on all aircraft, with those binoc's. then the light became brighter yet again, for maybe 15 seconds, and got dim again, and by that time i knew if i had moved the binoculars away from my eyes, i would not be able to see the object again. i watched it untill it went behing the neighbors chimney.   i have seen this type of light in the past, up in the sky, but never had binoculars with me.  i have seen ufo's in the past, but never have reported them.   my first sighting was on nov. 30th, 2003, i believe. i was looking out the window again, and saw an object in the day time, that seemed to appear out of nowhere, and then did a move that would appear to be about 2 inches, at arms length, very quickly, and then it moved in another dirction, again about 2 or 3 inches at arms length. then it just disappeared. but the strangest thing was the thougt that popped into my head, immediatly after that sighting, and the thought was more like a voice saying to me, " why so surprised, you've always known that they were there."   that was the weird part.     i almost never answer my landline phone. it doesn't work very well.
content.summary: Saw what i thought was a star or venus, lifted my 10x50 power binoc's, but it wasn't a star.

content.detailedDescription:
I was a young teen 12 or 13. my mother and her friends were heavy partiers and were consumed with the idea of lots of ufo activity in the area. most of thier sightings were over a canyon between campo and potrero. we stayed late at one of her friends house, i thought we left between 9 and 10 pm and was shocked when we got home after 1am. the house was down a very long driveway and had 3 gates that had to be opened and closed to keep the cattle in. i sat on the hood of the car to handle the gates as we got to them. at the middle gate i saw a flash of light and did not think anything of it. everybody in the car could not stop talking about how long the light lasted how bright it was, and why did it take over 4 hours to get home when it should not have taken more than 30 minutes. i have always told them that they were high and the only thing that happened was a falling star and that i was the only sober person there and was actually outside and nothing happened. i have always had kind of an uneasy feeling about the time but i have no confidence in who i was with.  

in my twenties i had a scar show up on my thigh, i had an irrational fear of letting the doctor see it. a friend was diagnosed with skin cancer, so i went and had a doctor look at it and he said it was an ingrown hair and tried to squeeze it. i was satisfied that it is not cancer but i also knew the doctor was wrong. two more have shown up on my shins, they look like burns, matching scars on each leg along with the lone scar on my thigh. 

i have also had an irrational fear of shaving my bikini line. i started spending a lot of time at the pool and talking girl talk with friends, my daughter and sister. they were talking about shaving and i never told them of my fear, but i resolved to just do it and get over it. when i shaved i found a scar in the crease where the leg joins the body about 3 inches long. i was upset because i could not figure out when or how i could have gotten it. i asked my mother about it and all she would say is that she knew something happened on that road all those years ago.

i don't really think anything happened, but it is eating at me.  how would i go about finding out if there is any relation to my scars and this so called event without letting anybody know i am inquiring about it?
content.summary: Bright light loss of time

content.detailedDescription: I was at an estate auction and went out for cigarette there were 5 or 6 people already out there, it was approx. 19:00. then an incredable round light the size of a car zoomed by followed by approx.14 more, we were all stuned, then aformation of 15 went by in a cresent form very slowly,  it was followed by another formation exactly the same going very slowly too,then this huge rectangle ship all black no lights went by when i saw it the first thing i thought of was a whale shark, the front was identicle to a whale sharks head, flat and wide,in the middle of the front was a rectangle observation window,you coud see the sillouette of two beings from the shoulders up,this ship was absolutely huge,after it  went by very slowly it was followed by two 15 each cresent formations going very slowly too,after they went by there were another 15 following them flying very fast.I did buy 4 paintings at the auction so i have a receipt with the date,i just have to go through a drawer  with alot of other receipts to find it.This is a true story and is certainly the most incredable thing i;ve ever seen period.No problem with a lie detector test. we lost sight of it when it went back into the clouds.
content.summary: Huge ufo with 90 car size orbs in front and behind guarding it

content.detailedDescription:
In lake havasu on the same night that the mexican airforce reported spotting ufos wich were later explained as oil platforms in the gulf of mexico. 
 i was up late with my roomate in lake havasu arizona...My friend stepped outside to smoke a cigarette ...After being outside for a minute he comes inside to tell me hes seen a ufo..My friend points to sky saying that a object had appeared and dissapeared making no noise...While he described this the object reapeared..It showed itself as a large orb pulsating in colorful lights.....It stayed stationary for about one minute and then it began to slowly move across the sky..While we observed the object we heard a fighter jet coming onto the scene.....The jet flew straight at the orb object...Wen the jet approached the orb split into three orb making a triangle shape in the sky...The jet passed threw the triangle and one of the orbs chased the jet over the mountains tailing the jet very closely..The other two orbs merged back into one and seemed to almost cloak into a brite star...The next day we purchased a telescope to observe the star but we saw nothing of interest ...It was quite amazing esp wen the object slit into three......It did not seem to accelarate or decceleratet on moving at a speed and then stopping or moving......Te or dec
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: A group of three ufos merge amd chase fighter jet

content.detailedDescription:
We originally saw the object from our home, and since it was just hovering there with flashing lights in a manner weve never seen before as noted in video 1, we decided to drive to the location where we would be directly underneath it, as noted from video 2. from here we just watched for awhile in fascination until it ascended upwards until it was no longer visible. there were no sounds, only the lights that were flashing in a very coordinated fashion. i know luke air-force base is close-by, but it didnt look or sound like any plane ive ever seen before, though i dont want to rule anything out. 
at first we believed it could have been a helicopter, but it didnt have either the shape or the sound, so thats what led us to drive a bit closer to get a better look. anyways, see for yourself and id be interested to know what you think.
content.summary: It just hovered for awhile and then ascended until it was no longer visible.

content.detailedDescription: Too hard to write about
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Moved around full moon ..Hovered..Then accelerated and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: So six family members & i went for a drive on feb.25,2012 at 8:00p.M we were heading through carson a town in washington state.We continued up to snow park toward hoodoo recreation area that is about 20 min north of carson. my husband ,sister-in-law and i were sitting in the back of the suv with the back door kept open .My husband had noticed a extremly bright light hovering above us. as my sister-in-law and i had looked up we had all three noticed that the object had been moving rather fast towards us as if it was a high speed chase.My sister-in-law had yelled to the driver to please stop,the driver had then slammed on her brakes at that time the object had also come to a complete and total stop so fast that it was clear to us the front of the craft dodged down. we all sat & looked at this thing for about 5 minutes before it slowly rose up & faded away.We continued up the road for a mile or so before it appeared again, not as aggressive as it had been but definately following us.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Carson wa experience

content.detailedDescription:
In 1981 i was on guard duty for the us army in fort eustis va with a nother soldier (female). it was around 1 am and we guarding the motor pool. i felt something behide my neck and look up and there they were 3 heagon shape ufo's. they were not giving out light but our post had a light in yellow light that reflicked the light up.  so we were looking at this object for about 5 minutes and then all three ufo's flew across the street over a two story bulding then vertically took off in light speed into the shy in a flash.  on one of your tv show you show a old  retired man that saw more or less what i saw and i want to say is thank you for showing the animation of the hexagon ufo's it gave me some peace.


miguel vigil
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 3 ufo's shape  like hexagon

content.detailedDescription: Hovering elongated objects one red one blue dropped bright white capsule shaped things then flew up over the mountains two different times.
content.summary: Hovering lights ejected capsule shaped glowing bright white objects then raised and went over the mntns

content.detailedDescription: My husband a friend and i were driving on interstate 5 northbound near the sea world exit on 12/31/2010, it was new years eve, at around sunset. my husband pointed out a light hovering almost directly in front of us in the sky, though it was many miles away further down the freeway. it was a blue light, light blue like the. color of those led blue lights. i noticed right away what he was talking about, because it was not normal to see that kind if light in the sky. i knew it was something special, nothing manmade though.I was holding my phone, but i didnt want to take a pic cause i didn't want to take my eyes off of it. the light, very quickly moved from in front of us to westbound, within seconds it was over by what i would assume was the water over la jolla, but it remained in sight. it hovered there for a few seconds and started down the coastline, and as it did it changed from one light, into two. the two lights both still the same blue color and size started weaving or what i have been describing as frolicking with eachother, almost as if playing with or racing eachother to the left of us down the coast. i had to turn around to see them because the vehicle i was in was moving freeway speeds. i watched the lights untill i couldnt see them any further. i just want to know if anyone else has seen this or reported it because i can't imagine we could have been the only ones. i also wonder what it could have been, i mean obviously it was a ufo to me because i have never seen such a thing, nor can i identify what it was. i now know there are such things as ufo's!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: blue lights over san diego coast on december 31, 2010

content.detailedDescription:
It was a cold winter night and i was bringing in some groceries from the car while i was inside my house  putting down some of the groceries and my dad yelled out, "come out here now!There's something weird out here!"so my mom and i went outside and saw three orblike things in a triangular shape and then while they were moving they changed to a singlefile line.The color of them were red-orange and yellow-orange.After about two or three minutes they started dissapering one by one.
my mom took a picture of the triangular form check it out!
content.summary: Scary

content.detailedDescription: Myself and my flatmate were stood on our balcony in manly (which faces south west towards mosman / sydney cbd) after a night out and we were looking out at the stars when we noticed an oject which was flashing. our immediate thought was that it was an aircraft (plane or helicopter) but after 5 mins or so it was still stationary in the sky and it seemed to be turning around. then we noticed another much smaller bright orange orb to the right. when the larger object turned around there was a clear triangle/boomerang shape which was flashing blue/white/red lights.. the smaller sphere started flashing back. they seemed to be commnicating to each other. we watched this for probably up to 40 mins at least. i actually have never believed in ufos but my flatmate saw exactly the same. to see other eye witness accounts for the same evening which are near on identical reaffirms that we did see something unusual!
content.summary: Two objects one triangle/boomerang shape flashing blue/whit/red lights and one bright orange sphere

content.detailedDescription: Myself and my two brother-in-laws were outside flying a kite with my son and saw these objects in the far distance up in the clouds.  some would be stationary and some would disappear and appear in a different location.  i ran inside and got my camera and took some pictures.  they were there long enough that we spotted them moving around and tried to determine what they could be.  thus far, i cannot explain what they could have been.
content.summary: Disk-like objects appearing in clouds.

content.detailedDescription: We go to a pilgrimage every year at lac st anne near alberta beach edmonton it was about 9 pm i looked up in the sky and saw this light coming down out of the sky the camp site i was in had 100dreds of people the sphere came in sound less it hovered above us about twenty feet i couldnt beleive what i was seeing and i went to the camp next to us and asked if they where seeing what i was seeing it was like the sphere was asking why we were there and what our gathering was all about it was like mental telepathy i got two pictures on a phone camera as it was leaving this was not the first time i saw this spere
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Sprere round red like hs inner ring color inside went from smoke grey to white in center hundreds of witnesses
